text: The Ugly Story () is a 1966 Soviet comedy movie directed by Aleksandr Alov and Vladimir Naumov.В рамках фестиваля "Короткие встречи" в Германии покажут две программы советского киноСкверный анекдот It stars Yevgeny Yevstigneyev, Viktor Sergachyov, and Aleksandr Gruzinsky. == Actors == * Yevgeny Yevstigneyev as Pralinsky * Viktor Sergachyov as Pseldonimov * Aleksandr Gruzinsky as Mlekopitayev * Elena Ponsova as Mlekopitayeva * Elizaveta Nikishchikhina as Bride == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:1966 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Naumov Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Alov Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: The Ugly Story
